data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fikáček, Martin, Short, Andrew E. Z. (2010): A revision of the Neotropical genus Sacosternum Hansen (Hydrophilidae: Sphaeridiinae: Megasternini). Zootaxa 2538: 1-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196674
